title: Federated Learning Data Privacy Attack Defense Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental machine learning concepts, federated learning architecture overview, and basic data security principles
context.additional_context: Recreating real attack scenarios and developing defense techniques in a practice-centered simulation environment

learning_goals: Learners can describe three types of data privacy attacks that may occur in federated learning environments.
Learners can simulate the principles of gradient matching-based attribute reconstruction attacks (cos-matching) and develop defense strategies.
Learners can analyze real-world attack scenarios using local training data from one or more epochs and propose countermeasures.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
